page.title: 15DISASTER ONE AT CRICKHOWELL
page.content: When we started back to school for the Autumn Term 1984 we little expected what was ahead of us. We immediately found that the{central {heating installation}which was to have been completed during the summer holidays had not even been started. We then had to put up with plumbers working and being ready to move out of our classrooms at short notice to allow them to work there. When the cold weather came the heating was still not finished and so we had to have mobile gas heaters in the classrooms. The heating was eventually working in February 1985 after our other two disasters had happened.
